thread.title: 25 Times Michael Cordero Stole Our Hearts On "Jane The Virgin"
thread.title_full: 25 Times Michael Cordero Stole Our Hearts On "Jane The Virgin"

author: Krystie Lee Yandoli
title: 25 Times Michael Cordero Stole Our Hearts On "Jane The Virgin"
text:
View this image ›
CW ID: 10501024 And even though his character will no longer be on the show, that doesn’t mean Michael won’t remain in our hearts forever. View this image ›
CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500637 1. From the moment we were introduced to Michael, Jane the Virgin fans knew this guy was something special. View this image ›
The CW / Via b99.tumblr.com ID: 10499734 2. Even when they were broken up, Michael never stopped caring about Jane. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10501002 3. And he never, ever gave up on their relationship. The CW / Via farhampton.tumblr.com
The CW / Via farhampton.tumblr.com
 ID: 10499764 4. He was always there to brighten up her day. View this image ›
The CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500580 5. I mean, he stopped at nothing to put a smile on Jane’s face. View this image ›
The CW / Via gael-garcia.tumblr.com ID: 10500792 6. And he was incredibly supportive of everything she did. View this image ›
The CW / Via grahamewill.tumblr.com ID: 10500732 7. He cared so deeply about Mateo, too. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10499594 8. And he was proud to be a part of his life. View this image ›
The CW / Via grahamewill.tumblr.com ID: 10500781 9. Their bond was super cute and touching, to say the least. The CW / Via miasiax.tumblr.com
The CW / Via miasiax.tumblr.com
 ID: 10500772 10. He was also incredibly good at his job. The CW
The CW
 ID: 10500837 11. And he made the best pop culture references. View this image ›
The CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500605 12. He wasn’t afraid to stand up for himself or for the people he cared about. View this image ›
The CW / Via jtvgifs.tumblr.com ID: 10499860 13. Plus, he had the cutest relationship with Rogelio. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10499617 14. Their BFF handshake was truly unmatched. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10499629 15. When he and Jane got back together ~for good~, it was so magical that snow even fell when they kissed. View this image ›
The CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500629 16. He was always so thoughtful and knew exactly how to make Jane happy. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10499644 17. Including when he asked her to marry him…again! View this image ›
The CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500597 18. He was such a good sport when Rogelio wanted to throw him a bachelor party. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10501012 19. And he was super adorable when he actually married Jane, the love of his life. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10499710 20. ESPECIALLY when he surprised her by reciting his vows in Spanish. View this image ›
The CW / Via b99.tumblr.com ID: 10499740 21. And when he danced the night away, showing off his impressive skills. View this image ›
The CW / Via talesofnorth.tumblr.com ID: 10499812 22. (Seriously, check out those moves.) View this image ›
The CW / Via stefansalfatore.tumblr.com ID: 10499757 23. And he made sure the build-up to having sex for the first time was worth Jane’s while. View this image ›
The CW / Via giphy.com ID: 10500647 24. Michael even made peace with Rafael and the two of them bonded, in his own dorky way. View this image ›
The CW / Via grahamewill.tumblr.com ID: 10500698 View this image ›
The CW / Via grahamewill.tumblr.com ID: 10500702 View this image ›
The CW / Via grahamewill.tumblr.com ID: 10500710 25. And even though it was for just a short time, Michael brought an unbelievable amount of joy into Jane’s life, and to us all. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10501275 TEAM MICHAEL FOREVER. View this image ›
The CW ID: 10500048 The CW
The CW
 ID: 10499610
